mapper.insert: insert into GENRE_TABLE (gseq, gmseq, gaction, gcomedy, gcrime, gdocumentary, gdrama, gfamily, gfantasy, gnoir, ghorror, gmusical, gmystery, gromance, gsf, gsports, gthriller, gwar, gcar, grabbit, ganimation, gchildren, ghistory, groco, gdisaster, gwuxia, gwestern, ghotguy, ghighteen, gdomestic, gforeign) values (#{gseq}, #{gmseq}, #{gaction}, #{gcomedy}, #{gcrime}, #{gdocumentary}, #{gdrama}, #{gfamily}, #{gfantasy}, #{gnoir}, #{ghorror}, #{gmusical}, #{gmystery}, #{gromance}, #{gsf}, #{gsports}, #{gthriller}, #{gwar}, #{gcar}, #{grabbit}, #{ganimation}, #{gchildren}, #{ghistory}, #{groco}, #{gdisaster}, #{gwuxia}, #{gwestern}, #{ghotguy}, #{ghighteen}, #{gdomestic}, #{gforeign})
